welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Marion, USA! Known for its charming small-town feel and rich history, we invite you to explore our beautiful city and all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Eastern Iowa Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Eastern Iowa Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Iowa City Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Iowa City Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.
